programme.title: Premier League Review: 2007/08

programme.title: Premier League Review: 2010/11

programme.desc: Het stadion is een theater en het publiek moet vermaakt worden. Vanuit die overtuiging introduceert Co Adriaanse in 1988 het 'Kerstboomsysteem' bij FC Den Haag.

programme.title: Café Galgenwaard
programme.desc: In Cafe Galgenwaard van FC Utrecht TV schuiven eens per maand (oud-)spelers, bestuurders en clubvolgers aan om te bespreken wat er speelt rondom FC Utrecht. In deze speciale kerstaflevering zijn trainer Ron Jans en zijn assistenten Kevin van Veen en Rob Penders te gast.

programme.title: Voetbalpraatjes
programme.desc: Presentatrice Fresia Cousiño Arias ontvangt drie jonge voetbalvolgers in de setting van Voetbalpraat. Geen tactische analyses of ingewikkelde statistieken, maar voetbal zoals kinderen het beleven: spontaan, vrolijk en enthousiast. Voetbalpraatjes neemt de kijker mee in de voetbalbeleving van kinderen, die onder anderen reageren op stellingen van bekende spelers en speelsters. En in de rubriek 'Warmlopers' krijgen kinderen een exclusief kijkje achter de schermen.

programme.desc: Samenvatting van de wedstrijd Al-Ittihad - FC Nasaf, gespeeld in de competitiefase van de AFC Champions League.

programme.title: Voetbal Geeft
programme.desc: Rob (78) is al meer dan zeventig jaar supporter van Heracles Almelo. Onlangs kreeg hij de diagnose dementie. Juist omdat zijn geheugen hem nu steeds vaker in de steek laat, zijn de herinneringen aan het stadion voor Rob van onschatbare waarde. Daarom sprak hij één grote wens uit: nog één allerlaatste keer een wedstrijd van zijn club meemaken.

programme.title: ESPN DOC
programme.desc: Op 25 november 2025 is het precies vijf jaar geleden dat Diego Armando Maradona overleed. De Argentijn loodste zijn land in 1986 eigenhandig naar de wereldtitel en nam eind jaren '80 het toen nog kleine Napoli bij de hand op weg naar twee Italiaanse landstitels. In 'Op zoek naar Maradona' ontmoet AD-journalist Sjoerd Mossou - schrijver van het gelijknamige boek - verschillende mensen op wie Maradona grote indruk maakte.

programme.title: Voetbal Geeft
programme.desc: Rob (78) is al meer dan zeventig jaar supporter van Heracles Almelo. Onlangs kreeg hij de diagnose dementie. Juist omdat zijn geheugen hem nu steeds vaker in de steek laat, zijn de herinneringen aan het stadion voor Rob van onschatbare waarde. Daarom sprak hij één grote wens uit: nog één allerlaatste keer een wedstrijd van zijn club meemaken.

programme.title: Voetbalpraatjes
programme.desc: Presentatrice Fresia Cousiño Arias ontvangt drie jonge voetbalvolgers in de setting van Voetbalpraat. Geen tactische analyses of ingewikkelde statistieken, maar voetbal zoals kinderen het beleven: spontaan, vrolijk en enthousiast. Voetbalpraatjes neemt de kijker mee in de voetbalbeleving van kinderen, die onder anderen reageren op stellingen van bekende spelers en speelsters. En in de rubriek 'Warmlopers' krijgen kinderen een exclusief kijkje achter de schermen.

programme.title: ESPN DOC
programme.desc: Op 25 november 2025 is het precies vijf jaar geleden dat Diego Armando Maradona overleed. De Argentijn loodste zijn land in 1986 eigenhandig naar de wereldtitel en nam eind jaren '80 het toen nog kleine Napoli bij de hand op weg naar twee Italiaanse landstitels. In 'Op zoek naar Maradona' ontmoet AD-journalist Sjoerd Mossou - schrijver van het gelijknamige boek - verschillende mensen op wie Maradona grote indruk maakte.

programme.title: Voetbalpraatjes
programme.desc: Presentatrice Fresia Cousiño Arias ontvangt drie jonge voetbalvolgers in de setting van Voetbalpraat. Geen tactische analyses of ingewikkelde statistieken, maar voetbal zoals kinderen het beleven: spontaan, vrolijk en enthousiast. Voetbalpraatjes neemt de kijker mee in de voetbalbeleving van kinderen, die onder anderen reageren op stellingen van bekende spelers en speelsters. programme.title: ESPN DOC
programme.desc: Go Ahead Eagles is bezig aan een nu al historisch seizoen. De club is regerend bekerwinnaar én reuzendoder in de Eredivisie en Europa League. De opmars van rood en geel is te zien in een gloednieuwe reeks van Home of Eus, de documentaireserie van Özcan Akyol (Eus). In de eerste aflevering onderzoekt Eus hoe Go Ahead Eagles zich klaarmaakt voor het grootste seizoen uit haar clubhistorie. En dat terwijl 'Kowet' nog maar zeven jaar geleden bivakkeerde in de kelder van de Eerste Divisie.

programme.desc: Verslag van de wedstrijd Al Ahli - Andijan, gespeeld in de groepsfase van de AFC Champions League Two.

programme.title: ESPN Fantasy Voetbal Show
programme.desc: De Fantasy Voetbal Show is hét programma over het leukste voetbalmanager-spel rondom de VriendenLoterij Eredivisie. Kijk wekelijks voor de beste tips, strategieën en verborgen pareltjes voor ESPN Fantasy Voetbal.

programme.title: Voetbalpraatjes
programme.desc: Presentatrice Fresia Cousiño Arias ontvangt drie jonge voetbalvolgers in de setting van Voetbalpraat. Geen tactische analyses of ingewikkelde statistieken, maar voetbal zoals kinderen het beleven: spontaan, vrolijk en enthousiast. Voetbalpraatjes neemt de kijker mee in de voetbalbeleving van kinderen, die onder anderen reageren op stellingen van bekende spelers en speelsters. En in de rubriek 'Warmlopers' krijgen kinderen een exclusief kijkje achter de schermen.

programme.title: Voetbal Geeft
programme.desc: Rob (78) is al meer dan zeventig jaar supporter van Heracles Almelo. Onlangs kreeg hij de diagnose dementie. Juist omdat zijn geheugen hem nu steeds vaker in de steek laat, zijn de herinneringen aan het stadion voor Rob van onschatbare waarde. Daarom sprak hij één grote wens uit: nog één allerlaatste keer een wedstrijd van zijn club meemaken.

programme.title: ESPN DOC
programme.desc: Mario Been blies onlangs zestig kaarsjes uit. Om dat te vieren besloten zijn vrienden om hem mee terug te nemen naar het Italiaanse Pisa, waar Been drie jaar speelde voor de plaatselijke club. In 'Grande Mario' reizen we met drie voetbalvrienden terug in de tijd, naar de gloriejaren van de Serie A.

programme.title: Voetbal Geeft
programme.desc: Rob (78) is al meer dan zeventig jaar supporter van Heracles Almelo. Onlangs kreeg hij de diagnose dementie. Juist omdat zijn geheugen hem nu steeds vaker in de steek laat, zijn de herinneringen aan het stadion voor Rob van onschatbare waarde. Daarom sprak hij één grote wens uit: nog één allerlaatste keer een wedstrijd van zijn club meemaken.

programme.desc: L'uomo Contro La Macchina - Max Verstappen nel 2025 ha perso il trono ma ha conquistato la definitiva consacrazione sfidando i piloti McLaren con un mezzo inferiore: riviviamo la sua stagione spettacolare.

programme.title: Rivoluzione 2026
programme.desc: Rivoluzione 2026 - Prepariamoci al cambio piu' radicale della storia della F1. Macchina, motore, carburante, gomme: sara' tutto nuovo. Matteo Bobbi ci spiega l'imminente rivoluzione.

programme.title: In pista con Jannik
programme.desc: In pista con Jannik - Tutta la passione di Jannik Sinner per la F1 nell'intervista con Stefano Domenicali e nel giro in macchina con Kimi Antonelli

programme.title: Gara: GP Monaco
programme.desc: Gara: GP Monaco - Il Gran Premio piu' iconico del mondiale quest'anno presenta un'incognita in piu': due soste ai box obbligatorie. Chi vincera' la roulette? Telecronaca di Carlo Vanzini, Marc Gene' e Roberto Chinchero.

programme.title: Motori F1 Race Anatomy - Stag. Motori Race Anatomy F1 2025 - Motori Race Anatomy F1 2025 Ep.25 Speciale Natale 2025 22/12/2025
programme.desc: Speciale Natale - L'analisi del Gran Premio disputato per commentare la gara insieme agli ospiti in studio. Riviviamo i brividi della corsa attraverso le immagini piu' spettacolari e ascoltiamo i commenti a caldo dei protagonisti.

programme.desc: Il Caso Hamilton

How The Ryder Cup Was Won
programme.desc: A look back at The 1995 Ryder Cup at Oakhill Country Club. America were the holders and Europe had only won once on US soil. Bernard Gallacher was to make amends.

programme.title: Mauritius Open 2019 Highlights
programme.desc: Day three of the AfrAsia Bank Mauritius Open on the European Tour from the Heritage Golf Club in Mauritius.

programme.title: Mauritius Open 2022 Highlights
programme.desc: The fourth day of the 2022 Afrasia Bank Mauritius Open, taking place at Mont Choisy Le Golf. Frenchman Antoine Rozner takes a two-stroke lead into the final round. (18.12)

programme.title: Mauritius Open 2023 Highlights
programme.desc: Day four of the AfrAsia Bank Mauritius Open - the final DP World Tour event of the year - at Heritage La Réserve Golf Club. It was a resounding win for Antoine Rozner in 2022. (17.12)

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the Sentry, the first PGA Tour event of the season, taking place at Kapalua Golf. Chris Kirk began 2024 in style, picking up the first PGA Tour win of season.

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am, a PGA Tour event held in California. Wyndham Clark earned his third tour win here a year ago.

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the PGA Tour's 2025 Genesis Invitational. Former Masters champion Hideki Matsuyama clinched victory at the 2024 edition of this event.

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2025 Arnold Palmer Invitational presented by Mastercard, a PGA Tour event in Orlando, Florida, won previously by two-time Masters champion Scottie Scheffler.

programme.title: Players Championship Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 51st edition of the Players Championship from TPC Sawgrass, as Scottie Scheffler set out to become a three-time champion.

programme.title: Masters Final Round Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from the final round of The Masters. Rory McIlroy held the lead heading into a Sunday duel with Bryson DeChambeau, each trying to add a Masters to his Major portfolio. (13.04)

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2025 RBC Heritage, a PGA Tour event held at Harbour Town Golf Links in South Carolina. Last season, Scottie Scheffler claimed the win here.

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the PGA Tour's Truist Championship, taking place at the Philadelphia Cricket Club. 2025 Masters champion Rory McIlroy claimed victory last season.

programme.title: PGA Championship Final Round Hlts
programme.desc: The fourth and final round of the 2025 PGA Championship at Quail Hollow Golf Club. (18.05)

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from 2025 Memorial Tournament at Muirfield Village Golf Club in Dublin, Ohio.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf Final Round Hlts
programme.desc: The concluding round of the 125th US Open as Sam Burns bids to hold his nerve with Adam Scott rolling back the years. Viktor Hovland and Tyrrell Hatton are also in contention. (15.06)

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from the Travelers Championship, a PGA Tour event held at TPC River Highlands in Connecticut. Three-time champion Major champion Scottie Scheffler won this event last season.

programme.title: The 153rd Open: Final Round Hlts
programme.desc: The final day of the 153rd Open Championship at Royal Portrush in Northern Ireland. World number one Scottie Scheffler stretched his lead at the top of the pack on Saturday. (20.07)

programme.title: Justin Rose Junior Championship
programme.desc: Highlights from the finals of the 2025 Justin Rose Telegraph Junior Golf Championship - one of the UK's leading youth tournaments held at Quinta do Lago in Portugal.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf Official Films
programme.desc: The official film of the 2025 US Open. Battling through the toughest of Oakmont challenges, JJ Spaun became one of the most unlikely Major winners in recent memory.

programme.title: Mcllroy '25: A Career Year
programme.desc: A look at an unprecedented year in the career of the newly minted Grand Slam champion Rory McIlroy, who finally ended his wait for an illustrious Green Jacket during the 2025 season.

programme.title: 2025 PGA Tour Year in Review
programme.desc: After a year scintillating golf on the men's professional circuit, take a moment to reflect on the season with an in-depth review of the 2025 PGA Tour campaign.

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the season-ending Tour Championship as the top 30 compete at the FedExCup Playoffs finale in Atlanta, Georgia.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: The fourth and final day of the AfrAsia Bank Mauritius Open at Heritage La Réserve Golf Links. This is the concluding event in the DP World Tour's Opening Swing. (20.12)

programme.title: PGA Championship Official Film2012
programme.desc: The official film of the 2012 PGA Championship from Kiawah Island Golf Resort in South Carolina. Keegan Bradley entered this tournament as defending champion.

programme.title: PGA Championship Official Film2014
programme.desc: The official film of the 2014 PGA Championship from Valhalla Golf Club in Kentucky. Jason Dufner entered this tournament as defending champion.

programme.title: PGA Championship Film 2024
programme.desc: This is the story of 2024 PGA Championship from Valhalla Golf Club, the scene of Xander Schauffele's first Major championship win.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: The School of Golf offers tips and tricks on how to improve your golfing game. Here, learn how to correct the slices in your game. Ep 6.

programme.title: Golf Academy: Mel Reid
programme.desc: Ladies European Tour golfer Mel Reid shares her tips and advice on improving your game in the latest episode of the Golf Academy.

programme.title: Golf Academy: Lanto Griffin
programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game across all aspects, from the tee to the green. Here, former PGA Tour winner Lanto Griffin gives some tips.

programme.title: LPGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: The fourth and final day of the 2025 Chevron Championship - the first women's Major of the 2025 season - taking place at the Club at Carlton Woods in Texas.

programme.title: U.S Women's Open Golf R4 Hlts
programme.desc: The final round of the 2025 US Women's Open, the second women's Major of the 2025 season. Maja Stark of Sweden looks to defend her lead with top-ranked Nelly Korda in contention. (01.06)

programme.title: Women's PGA Championship Hlts
programme.desc: The fourth and final day of the 2025 KPMG Women's PGA Championship, taking place at Fields Ranch in Frisco, Texas. (22.06)

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from the Travelers Championship, a PGA Tour event held at TPC River Highlands in Connecticut. Three-time champion Major champion Scottie Scheffler won this event last season.

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the St Jude Championship - the first of three events to determine this year's FedExCup champion - as the top 70 in the standings compete in the FedExCup Playoffs.

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf
programme.desc: Round four of the season-ending Tour Championship - the FedExCup finale. Tommy Fleetwood and Patrick Cantlay share the lead, with US Ryder Cup captain Keegan Bradley firmly in the mix.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf
programme.desc: The third day of the season-ending DP World Tour Championship, taking place Jumeirah Golf Estates. Rasmus Neergaard-Petersen and Rory McIlroy, eyeing a second successive Dubai double, lead.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: The fourth and final day of the Hero Dubai Desert Classic, the first Rolex Series event of 2025 on the DP World Tour calendar, held at the iconic Emirates Golf Club. (19.01)

programme.title: ATP Beijing 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the 2025 China Open, an ATP Tour 500 event held in Beijing.

programme.title: ATP Tokyo 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the 2025 Japan Open, an ATP Tour 500 event staged in Tokyo.

programme.title: ATP Paris 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the ATP Tour's final Masters 1000 event of 2025 in the capital of France.

programme.title: Sampras v Agassi 2002
programme.desc: In the men's singles final at the 2002 US Open, Pete Sampras would embark on the final match of his illustrious career, extending his perfect record over Andre Agassi at the New York Slam.

programme.title: Alcaraz v Sinner 2022
programme.desc: Return to a classic tennis match for the ages, as Carlos Alcaraz and Jannik Sinner locked horns for a blistering five hours and 15 minutes in the 2022 US Open quarter-finals.

programme.title: Alcaraz v Ruud 2022
programme.desc: Carlos Alcaraz and Casper Ruud went toe to toe in the final of the men's singles at the 2022 US Open. With the Arthur Ashe stage set, both players were going for a first career Grand Slam.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In a five-hour, five-set Rome Open epic, an 18-year-old Rafael Nadal lit up the Foro Italico in his back-and-forth contest with Argentina's Guillermo Coria.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In pursuit of the first of her three Toronto titles, Serena Williams came across serial winner Monica Seles, a four-time winner in her own right, in the 2001 semi-finals.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: The budding Rafael Nadal-Roger Federer rivalry comes to a boil as the iconic pair went head to head in the 2006 Rome Masters final. Nadal had won four of their first five meetings.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Roaring back from long-term injury, former champion Kim Clijsters would meet top seed and world number one Lindsay Davenport in the 2005 Indian Wells final.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Andy Murray, the defending champion, and Novak Djokovic - meeting for the first time since the 2012 US Open final - went back and forth across three thrilling sets for the Shanghai title.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Clinching the fifth of her eight Miami Open titles, Serena Williams would have to overcome one of her great rivals Justine Henin as the pair met in a highly anticipated 2007 final.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Saving four match points in the process, Roger Federer was pushed to the limit in his 2014 ATP Finals semi-final meeting with fellow Swiss superstar Stan Wawrinka.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In a three-hour test of wills, Justine Henin was bidding to close an up-and-down year with the defence of her WTA Finals title against Maria Sharapova in 2007.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In a match that would decide the 2016 year-end world number one, Andy Murray - looking to cap a storybook season at The O2 in London - met rival Novak Djokovic at the ATP Finals.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Adding the Doha title to her successful Australian Open defence, Victoria Azarenka kept Serena Williams at bay as the top two seeds served up a memorable final in 2013.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: A 36-year-old Novak Djokovic rolled back the years in a three-set classic against world number one Carlos Alcaraz to claim the Cincinnati title - his 39th ATP Masters 1000 crown.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: A US Open finalist one month prior, Caroline Wozniacki's 2014 WTA Finals campaign got underway against then world number two Maria Sharapova in Singapore.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: The China Open climax sees Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz get set for a second final meeting. Sinner aims to defend the crown, while Alcaraz looks to avenge last year's defeat.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In a rematch of the 2023 Madrid Open final, world number one Iga Swiatek and defending champion Aryna Sabalenka meet again to determine this year's women's singles champion.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Andre Agassi and Pete Sampras met in the 2001 Indian Wells final - one of 34 career meetings. Agassi eyed a second consecutive win over Sampras in their first meeting in over a year.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In the 1996 Indian Wells final, Steffi Graf - having made her competitive return after a four-month injury layoff - would compete with Spain's Conchita Martinez for the title.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In a battle of generations, two of the all-time greats Roger Federer and Andre Agassi fought for the year-end championship in 2003. Federer was aiming for his first title on American soil.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Meeting for the first time in a final at tour level, the Williams sisters Venus and Serena went toe to toe in an emotionally charged contest for the Miami Open title.

programme.title: WTA Madrid 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the 2025 Madrid Open, a WTA 1000 clay-court event held in the Spanish capital.

programme.title: WTA Rome 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia, a WTA 1000 clay-court event held at the Foro Italico in Rome.

programme.title: WTA Montreal 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the women's singles at the 2025 Canadian Open, a WTA 1000 hard-court event held in Montreal.

programme.title: WTA Cincinnati 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the women's singles at the Cincinnati Open, a WTA Tour 1000 hard-court event.

programme.title: Serena v Hingis 1999
programme.desc: Twenty-two years before Emma Raducanu's triumph over Leylah Fernandez, Serena Williams and Martina Hingis locked horns in an all-teenage final at the 1999 US Open in the women's singles.

programme.title: Graf v Seles 1995
programme.desc: Two greats of professional tennis contested the 1995 women's singles final at the US Open, as Monica Seles - returning from a terrifying on-court ordeal in 1993 - faced Steffi Graf.

programme.title: Navratilova v Evert 1984
programme.desc: Martina Navratilova completed her dominant march to the 1984 US Open women's title, as she defeated the home favourite Chris Evert in a fervent Flushing Meadows atmosphere.

programme.title: Austin v Evert 1979
programme.desc: A 16-year-old Tracy Austin became the youngest US Open champion at the 1979 championships after defeating the four-time defending champion Chris Evert.

programme.title: ATP Final: Indian Wells
programme.desc: Britain's Jack Draper competes in his maiden ATP Masters 1000 final at Indian Wells as the top-10 bound Brit faces Holger Rune. Draper knocked out Carlos Alcaraz in the last four. (16.03)

programme.title: ATP Final: Toronto
programme.desc: Ben Shelton features in his first ATP Masters final as the 22-year-old eyes world number six status against Karen Khachanov, who ends a seven-year wait to compete on this stage. (07.08)

programme.title: ATP Final: Washington
programme.desc: Into his second final of 2025, Australian world number 13 Alex de Minaur meets Spaniard Alejandro Davidovich Fokina. De Minaur fell short in the Washington final back in 2018. (27.07)

programme.title: ATP Final: Stuttgart
programme.desc: In a blockbuster Stuttgart final, world number three Alexander Zverev competes for a maiden grass-court title against second seed Taylor Fritz, who leads the head to head 7-5. (15.06)

programme.title: ATP Final: Adelaide
programme.desc: Number two seed Sebastian Korda of America stands between Felix Auger-Aliassime and a sixth tour-level title for the Canadian, as the two clash in the Adelaide International final. (11.01)

programme.title: ATP Final: Geneva
programme.desc: A chance for Novak Djokovic to join Jimmy Connors and Roger Federer in winning a 100th tour-level title, as the 38-year-old Serb battles Hubert Hurkacz in the Geneva Open final. (24.05)

programme.title: ATP Final: Athens
programme.desc: A win away from securing a dream debut appearance at the ATP Finals, Lorenzo Musetti must overcome Novak Djokovic to book his spot in Turin. Djokovic eyes his 101st title in Athens. (08.11)

programme.title: ATP Final: Munich
programme.desc: Entering his fourth ATP final, second seed Ben Shelton faces off with first seed Alexander Zverev - chasing his third BMW Open crown - in the Munich final. (20.04)

programme.title: ATP Final: Beijing
programme.desc: A victor is crowned at the China Open, as world number two Jannik Sinner - chasing his third title of 2025 - faces 19-year-old Learner Tien, who enters his first tour-level final. (01.10)

programme.title: ATP Final: Vienna
programme.desc: In a rematch of the Australian Open final, Jannik Sinner and Alexander Zverev meet in Vienna. Sinner, appearing in his eighth final of 2025, bids to deny Zverev a second title here. (26.10)

programme.title: ATP Final: Paris
programme.desc: A year-end champion is crowned in the French capital at the Rolex Paris Masters. (02.11)

programme.title: ATP Finals: Turin Final
programme.desc: World number one Carlos Alcaraz faces Italy's reigning ATP Finals champion Jannik Sinner in their sixth meeting of the year, marking the finale to the 2025 Tour season in Turin. (16.11)

programme.title: ATP Final: Rotterdam
programme.desc: Carlos Alcaraz attempts to cap his debut at the ABN AMRO Open in Rotterdam with a 17th tour-level title, as the top seed squares off against world number six Alex de Minaur. (09.02)

programme.title: ATP Final: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Chasing a sixth ATP 1000 title and a first in Monte-Carlo, 21-year-old Spaniard Carlos Alcaraz competes in a blockbuster clash with first-time Masters finalist Lorenzo Musetti. (13.04)

programme.title: ATP Final: Rome
programme.desc: World number one Jannik Sinner takes on soon-to-be world number two Carlos Alcaraz in a blockbuster Italian Open final. Between them, the pair have won the last five majors. (18.05)

programme.title: US Open: Alcaraz v Sinner
programme.desc: Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz play out the next chapter in their rivalry as the reigning champion and the 2022 winner compete for the US Open crown in New York. (07.09)

programme.title: ATP Final: Tokyo
programme.desc: World number one Carlos Alcaraz and former finalist Taylor Fritz - the top two seeds - go one on one for the title. Fritz got the better of Alcaraz in last week's Laver Cup meeting. (30.09)

programme.title: Tennis 2025 Season Review
programme.desc: With both the WTA and ATP Finals in the history books, enjoy a full review of the 2025 season.

programme.title: ATP Season Review Show 2025
programme.desc: A full breakdown and review of the 2025 season on the men's tour.

programme.title: US Open Men's Final
programme.desc: Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz play out the next chapter in their rivalry as the reigning champion and the 2022 winner compete for the US Open crown in New York. (07.09)

programme.title: US Open Women's Final
programme.desc: Amanda Anisimova, the home favourite, faces Aryna Sabalenka, the defending US Open champion, as the American competes in her second consecutive Grand Slam final. (06.09)

programme.title: WTA Wuhan 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the 2025 Wuhan Open - the last WTA Tour 1000 event of the year.

programme.title: WTA Finals 2025 Riyadh Review
programme.desc: A review of the 2025 WTA Finals, the season-ending event held in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

programme.title: WTA Doha 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the Qatar TotalEnergies Open in Doha, the WTA Tour's first 1000 event of the 2025 season.

programme.title: WTA Dubai 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the 2025 Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships, a WTA Tour 1000 event held in the United Arab Emirates.

programme.title: WTA Indian Wells 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the 2025 BNP Paribas Open, a WTA 1000 event held in Indian Wells in the United States.

programme.title: WTA Miami 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the 2025 Miami Open, a WTA 1000 event.

programme.title: WTA Final: Linz
programme.desc: Dayana Yastremska ends a near three-year wait to compete for a WTA title, as the Ukrainian faces the number four seed Ekaterina Alexandrova in the Upper Austria Ladies Linz final. (02.02)

programme.title: WTA Final: Indian Wells
programme.desc: Mirra Andreeva meets top seed Aryna Sabalenka in the Indian Wells final. Sabalenka avenged her Australian Open defeat to Keys in the semis, while Andreeva dethroned Swiatek. (16.03)

programme.title: WTA Final: Rome
programme.desc: A women's singles champion is crowned at the Italian Open, as home favourite and world number five Jasmine Paolini faces the American Coco Gauff. (17.05)

programme.title: WTA Final: Adelaide
programme.desc: In an all-American final at the Adelaide International, Jessica Pegula and Madison Keys contest the third instalment of their rivalry, with the head-to-head record at one apiece. (11.01)

programme.title: WTA Final: Charleston
programme.desc: Jessica Pegula enters her first Charleston Open final in her eighth appearance at the WTA 500 event, as the top seed faces 2020 Australian Open champion Sofia Kenin. (06.04)

programme.title: WTA Final: Bad Homburg
programme.desc: Contesting her first final in more than a year, and a first on grass, Iga Swiatek meets top seed Jessica Pegula for the Bad Homburg title. Swiatek leads the head-to-head record. (28.06)

programme.title: WTA Final: Ningbo
programme.desc: Out to strengthen her bid to reach the WTA Finals, Elena Rybakina targets WTA 500 glory in the Ningbo final as the world number nine meets fellow top-10 star Ekaterina Alexandrova. (19.10)

programme.title: WTA Finals
programme.desc: Aryna Sabalenka and Elena Rybakina - both undefeated in Riyadh - bid to become a first-time WTA Finals champion. This is the 14th meeting between the two, with Sabalenka 8-5 ahead. (08.11)

programme.title: WTA Final: Doha
programme.desc: Jelena Ostapenko's near seven-year wait to vie for a WTA 1000 title ends in Doha, as the former Grand Slam champion faces 23-year-old American Amanda Anisimova in an unseeded final. (15.02)

programme.title: WTA Final: Beijing
programme.desc: A women's singles champion is crowned in the final of the China Open - a WTA 1000 event. (05.10)

programme.title: WTA Final: Wuhan
programme.desc: Coco Gauff awaits compatriot Jessica Pegula, fresh from ending Aryna Sabalenka's 20-match winning run, in an all-American Wuhan final. The pair meet in their first final together. (12.10)

programme.title: WTA Final: Cincinnati
programme.desc: Six-time Grand Slam champion Iga Swiatek faces Jasmine Paolini for the Cincinnati title. In what will be Swiatek's 13th WTA 1000 final, Paolini is competing in just her third. (18.08)

programme.title: WTA Final: Seoul
programme.desc: Iga Swiatek enters her first Korea Open final as the 24-year-old Pole meets Ekaterina Alexandrova as the top two seeds vie for the WTA 500 title in Seoul. (21.09)

programme.title: WTA Final: Brisbane
programme.desc: World number one Aryna Sabalenka looks to claim a second Brisbane International title, after success in 2023, against qualifier Polina Kudermetova. (05.01)

programme.title: WTA Final: Miami
programme.desc: In Miami, the women's final get underway as top seed Aryna Sabalenka meets with home favourite Jessica Pegula in a repeat of last year's US Open decider. (29.03)

programme.title: WTA Final: Madrid
programme.desc: In a repeat of the 2023 US Open final, two-time Madrid champion Aryna Sabalenka eyes another marquee title against Coco Gauff, who won their only prior clay-court meeting. (03.05)

programme.title: US Open: Sabalenka v Anisimova
programme.desc: Amanda Anisimova, the home favourite, faces Aryna Sabalenka, the defending US Open champion, as the American competes in her second consecutive Grand Slam final. (06.09)

programme.title: ATP Final: Next Gen
programme.desc: The top two seeds, 2024 finalist Learner Tien and the unbeaten debutant Alexander Blockx, battle it out to become tennis' newest rising star in the final of the Next Gen ATP Finals. (21.12)

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: The fourth day of the DP World Tour's Bahrain Championship, taking place at the Royal Golf Club. In winning last year's event, Dylan Frittelli ended a six-year wait for success. (02.02)

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the DP World Tour's Joburg Open, taking place at Houghton Golf Club in South Africa.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the DP World Tour's 2025 Porsche Singapore Classic, showcasing some of Asia's brightest stars at Laguna National Golf Resort Club.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the Hainan Classic, a new DP World Tour event for 2025 held at Mission Hills Resort Haikou in China.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2025 KLM Open, a DP World Tour event held at the International in Amsterdam.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from 2025 BMW International Open, a DP World Tour event Golfclub München Eichenried in Germany. Scotland's Ewen Ferguson claimed victory last season.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the DP World Tour's Nexo Championship - formerly the Scottish Championship - taking place at Trump International Golf Links in Aberdeen, Scotland.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2025 Danish Golf Championship, a DP World Tour event taking place at Furesø Golf Klub in Copenhagen. Frenchman Frederic Lacroix returns to defend the title.

programme.title: Ladies European Tour Golf Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2025 Women's Scottish Open, a Ladies European Tour event held at Dundonald Links on the Ayrshire coast. This year's field boasts 13 Major champions.

programme.title: Chronicles of a Champion Golfer...
programme.desc: A look at a champion golfer at the world's pre-eminent Major, The Open. Here, look at the achievements of Scotsman Sandy Lyle, who was victorious at Royal St George's in 1985.

programme.title: Best of Rory McIlroy
programme.desc: Day four of the DP World Tour Championship at the Jumeirah Golf Estates in Dubai. Andy Sullivan led by a shot overnight from Rory McIlroy, who is chasing a second title here.

programme.title: Best of Rory McIlroy
programme.desc: Day four at the Irish Open Hosted By The Rory Foundation. After Saturday saw play suspended, Rory McIlroy goes into today leading on nine under, three clear of Masters champ Danny Willett.

programme.title: Best of Rory McIlroy
programme.desc: Highlights from the 2022 Tour Championship, as the FedExCup champion is crowned from between the PGA Tour's top 30 players at East Lake Golf Club in Georgia.

programme.title: Best of Rory McIlroy
programme.desc: The fifth and final day of the 2023 Dubai Desert Classic at the Emirates Golf Club. Rory McIlroy holds a three-shot lead, with rival Patrick Reed among the chasers. (30.01)

programme.title: Best of Rory McIlroy
programme.desc: The fourth and final day of the 2023 Genesis Scottish Open, taking place at the Renaissance Club. Among a star-studded field, Xander Schauffele is this year's defending champion. (16.07)

programme.title: Best of Rory McIlroy
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2024 Wells Fargo Championship, held at Quail Hollow Club in Charlotte, North Carolina. Wyndham Clark scooped the $3,600,000 prize pot last year.

programme.title: Best of Rory McIlroy
programme.desc: The fourth and final round of the DP World Tour Championship - the final event of the 2024 season - held on Jumeirah Golf Estates' Earth Course in Dubai. (17.11)

programme.title: Best of Rory McIlroy
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am, a PGA Tour event held in California. Wyndham Clark earned his third tour win here a year ago.

programme.title: Best of Rory McIlroy
programme.desc: The official film of the 2025 Players Championship at TPC Sawgrass in Ponte Vedra Beach. It would take a play-off between JJ Spaun and Rory McIlroy to decide the fate of the 51st edition.

programme.title: Best of Rory McIlroy
programme.desc: The fourth and final round of the 2025 Amgen Irish Open, a DP World Tour event staged at the K Club in Straffan, County Kildare. (07.09)

programme.title: Masters Final Round
programme.desc: On Sunday at Augusta, Rory McIlroy takes the 54-hole lead into the final round of The Masters as Bryson DeChambeau bids to deny the Irishman a first Green Jacket and the career Grand Slam.

programme.title: McIlroy '25: A Career Year
programme.desc: A look at an unprecedented year in the career of the newly minted Grand Slam champion Rory McIlroy, who finally ended his wait for an illustrious Green Jacket during the 2025 season.

programme.title: Masters Official Film 2025
programme.desc: The official film of the unforgettable 2025 Masters, where Rory McIlroy ended his agonising wait for the career Grand Slam in a dramatic play-off with Ryder Cup teammate Justin Rose.
